overview: A proven executive with 20 years of senior level management experience with public, private and venture backed firms in the high tech and services industry. David currently serves as Co-Founder and CEO of Jaega Software, Inc. Prior, David was the Vice President - Strategic Partner Group of BakBone Software, (acquired by Quest Software) which provided data protection software solutions to companies worldwide. He served as the President and CEO of Sanrise, Inc., a global provider of data storage management software and managed storage services. Schneider was an Entrepreneur-in-Residence at Crosspoint Venture Partners, a leading Silicon Valley Venture Capital firm, before he took the helm at Sanrise. He has also previously served in various senior management capacities at AT&T. David attended the University of Florida. In addition, he completed executive programs at the Wharton School of Business, University of Pennsylvania (c/o the AT&T School of Technology) and at the Harvard Business School, Harvard University.
